businesses.name: LYF Solutions
businesses.business_details:
Since 2000, LYF Solutions® has helped small business owners to grow online. What started as a hobby for founder Ray Pastoors when his next-door neighbour wanted to build a local magazine website for their community, turned into a full-scale business that has helped hundreds of work from home mums, dads and parents.

The business today looks after small business digital marketing needs across Australia and New Zealand and is known for its ethical carbon-neutral approach. LYF Solutions® has planted over 720 native trees and shrubs in Australia and supports a number of renewable energy projects. In addition, animal welfare organisations like The Orangutan Project and The Australian Koala Foundation, as part of its 1% for the Planet commitment.
businesses.product_details: We're an ethical digital marketing firm for small business owners. We help small businesses grow online through the power of digital marketing services such as web design and development, search engine optimisation, content marketing including social media and our green web hosting offering.
businesses.new_products:
- We are offering three months of free green web hosting for small business owners. You can choose any of our carbon neutral web hosting plans including the managed WordPress plans. 
- In addition, we are also offering one free digital marketing consultation.
businesses.headline: Ethical digital marketing firm for small business.
